privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy explains how InterGuide.app ("InterGuide", "we", "us", or "our") collects, uses, stores, and protects personal information when you use our services.
privacy.operatedBy: InterGuide is operated under the name InterGuide.app. Contact email: support@interguide.app

scope.title: 1. Scope
scope.content: This Privacy Policy applies to all users of the InterGuide platform, including free and paid users, and to all services provided through https://www.interguide.app.

youProvide.title: 2.1 Information You Provide
youProvide.intro: We collect information you voluntarily provide, including:
items: Name
Email address
Account credentials (encrypted passwords)
Content you create or upload, including:

automaticallyCollected.title: 2.2 Automatically Collected Information
automaticallyCollected.intro: We may automatically collect limited technical data necessary to operate the service, including:
items: IP address
Device and browser information
Session and authentication data
Usage activity within the platform
automaticallyCollected.usage: This data is used strictly for platform functionality, security, and internal analytics.

cookies.title: 3. Cookies
cookies.intro: InterGuide uses cookies strictly for operational purposes:
items: Authentication and login sessions
Autosave and workspace functionality
User interface preferences
Internal analytics
cookies.noTracking: We do not use advertising, tracking, or third-party marketing cookies.

analytics.title: 4. Analytics
analytics.content: We use internal analytics only to understand platform usage and improve reliability and performance. No advertising or behavioral tracking is performed.

payments.title: 5. Payments
payments.intro: InterGuide offers both free and paid plans.
payments.paypalOnly: Payments are processed exclusively through PayPal. We do not collect, process, or store payment card or billing information. Payment data is handled entirely by PayPal under their own privacy policy.

thirdPartyProviders.title: 6. Third-Party Service Providers
thirdPartyProviders.intro: We use trusted third-party infrastructure providers to operate the service, including:
items: Cloudflare (security and content delivery)
Render (application hosting)
MongoDB (database storage)
Cloudinary (media storage)
SAV (infrastructure services)
Resend (transactional email delivery)
thirdPartyProviders.dataProcessing: These providers process data only as necessary to deliver their services to InterGuide.

dataUse.title: 7. Data Use
items: Create and manage user accounts
Provide and operate the platform
Enable collaboration and workspace sharing
Maintain security and prevent abuse
Send essential service emails (authentication, password reset)
dataUse.noMarketing: We do not send marketing or promotional emails.

dataRetention.title: 8. Data Retention
items: Active accounts: Data is retained while the account is active.
Paid subscriptions ended: Workspace data is retained for up to 90 days after subscription termination.
After 90 days, data may be permanently deleted unless required for legal or operational purposes.
Users may request earlier deletion by contacting support@interguide.app.

accountDeletion.title: 9. Account Deletion
accountDeletion.intro: Users cannot self-delete accounts through the platform.
items: Delete their own content at any time
Request full account and data deletion by emailing support@interguide.app
accountDeletion.processingTime: Deletion requests are processed within a reasonable timeframe.

internationalDataTransfers.title: 10. International Data Transfers
internationalDataTransfers.content: Your data may be stored and processed on servers located outside your country of residence. We take reasonable measures to protect data regardless of location.

security.title: 11. Security
security.intro: We implement reasonable administrative, technical, and organizational safeguards, including:
items: Encrypted credentials
Access controls
Secure infrastructure providers
security.noGuarantee: No system is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

childrensPrivacy.title: 12. Children's Privacy
childrensPrivacy.content: InterGuide is not intended for users under 16 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal data from minors. If such data is discovered, it will be deleted.

yourRights.title: 13. Your Rights
yourRights.intro: Depending on your jurisdiction, you may have rights to:
items: Access your data
Correct inaccurate data
Request deletion
Object to certain processing
yourRights.contact: Requests should be sent to support@interguide.app.

changesToPolicy.title: 14. Changes to This Policy
changesToPolicy.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.

billing.title: Billing Policy
billing.intro: This Billing Policy governs subscriptions, payments, trials, renewals, cancellations, and refunds for InterGuide.app ("InterGuide", "we", "us"). This policy forms part of the InterGuide Terms of Service.

plansAndPricing.title: 1. Plans and Pricing
plansAndPricing.intro: InterGuide offers both free and paid subscription plans.
items: Free Plan: Limited access to the platform at no cost.
Paid Plan: $5 USD per month, following a 14-day free trial.
plansAndPricing.changes: Pricing may change in the future. Any changes will apply only to future billing periods and will be communicated in advance.

freeTrial.title: 2. Free Trial
items: New users may be eligible for a 14-day free trial of paid features.
No charges are applied during the trial period.
If a payment method is provided, billing begins automatically at the end of the trial unless canceled before the trial expires.

paymentProcessing.title: 3. Payment Processing
items: Payments are processed exclusively through PayPal.
InterGuide does not collect, store, or process payment card or banking information.
All payment information is handled directly by PayPal under their own terms and privacy policy.

billingCycle.title: 4. Billing Cycle and Renewal
items: Subscriptions are billed on a monthly recurring basis.
Billing occurs automatically at the beginning of each billing period.
By subscribing, you authorize PayPal to charge the applicable subscription fee on a recurring basis.

cancellations.title: 5. Cancellations
items: You may cancel your subscription at any time through PayPal or by contacting support@interguide.app.
Cancellation prevents future charges but does not refund the current billing period.
Access to paid features remains available until the end of the active billing cycle.

failedPayments.title: 6. Failed Payments
items: If a payment fails, access to paid features may be temporarily suspended.
InterGuide reserves the right to restrict or terminate access after repeated payment failures.

refundPolicy.title: 7. Refund Policy
items: Subscription fees are non-refundable, except where required by applicable law.
No partial refunds are provided for unused time.

downgrades.title: 8. Downgrades and Plan Changes
items: Plan changes take effect at the next billing cycle unless otherwise stated.
No credits are issued for downgrades during an active billing period.

dataRetention.title: 9. Data Retention After Subscription Ends
items: When a paid subscription ends, access to the workspace and published portals is suspended.
Workspace data is retained for up to 90 days.
After 90 days, data may be permanently deleted unless the user reactivates the subscription or requests deletion earlier.

taxes.title: 10. Taxes
items: Prices listed do not include applicable taxes unless stated otherwise.
You are responsible for any taxes imposed by your jurisdiction.

changesToPolicy.title: 11. Changes to This Billing Policy
changesToPolicy.content: We may update this Billing Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your access to and use of InterGuide.app ("InterGuide", "we", "us", or "our"). By accessing or using the service at https://www.interguide.app, you agree to be bound by these Terms.
terms.operatedBy: InterGuide is operated under the name InterGuide.app. Contact email: support@interguide.app

theService.title: 1. The Service
theService.intro: InterGuide provides a platform for building knowledge bases and walkthroughs and publishing them as shareable or embeddable portals. Features may evolve over time.
theService.rights: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any part of the service at any time.

eligibility.title: 2. Eligibility
eligibility.age: You must be at least 16 years old to use InterGuide.
eligibility.consent: If you are under the age of 18, you represent that you have permission from a parent or legal guardian. We do not knowingly allow use by individuals under 16.

accounts.title: 3. Accounts
accounts.intro: You must create an account to access most features.
items: Provide accurate information
Maintain the security of your credentials
Be responsible for all activity under your account
accounts.termination: InterGuide may suspend or terminate accounts that violate these Terms.

subscriptions.title: 4. Subscriptions, Trials, and Billing
subscriptions.intro: Paid features are offered on a subscription basis as described in the Billing Policy, which is incorporated into these Terms.
items: $5 USD/month for the first 12 months, then $10 USD/month
Pricing may change at any time
Payments processed exclusively via PayPal
No refunds except where required by law

ownership.title: 5.1 Ownership
ownership.intro: You retain ownership of all content you create or upload, including text, walkthroughs, images, videos, and files ("User Content").
ownership.noClaim: InterGuide does not claim ownership over your User Content.

license.title: 5.2 License to Operate
license.content: By using the service, you grant InterGuide a limited, non-exclusive, worldwide license to host, store, process, display, and transmit User Content solely for the purpose of operating and improving the service.

platform.title: 5.3 Platform Structure
platform.content: InterGuide retains all rights to the platform architecture, workflows, layouts, schemas, and system-generated structures used to organize User Content.

acceptableUse.title: 6. Acceptable Use
items: Upload illegal or infringing content
Harass, abuse, or harm others
Interfere with platform security or performance
Use the service for unlawful purposes
acceptableUse.rights: We reserve the right to remove content or restrict access at our discretion.

collaboration.title: 7. Collaboration and Sharing
collaboration.content: InterGuide allows workspace sharing and collaboration between users. You are responsible for managing access permissions and the consequences of sharing content.

suspension.title: 8. Suspension and Termination
suspension.intro: We may suspend or terminate your access if you:
items: Violate these Terms
Fail to pay applicable fees
Create risk or legal exposure
terminationItems: Access to paid features and portals is disabled
Data retention is handled per the Privacy Policy and Billing Policy

dataRetention.title: 9. Data Retention
items: Workspace data is retained for up to 90 days
Data may be deleted after this period
Earlier deletion may be requested via support@interguide.app

intellectualProperty.title: 10. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All InterGuide software, branding, design, and platform technology are owned by InterGuide.app and protected by intellectual property laws.

thirdPartyServices.title: 11. Third-Party Services
thirdPartyServices.content: InterGuide relies on third-party infrastructure and services. We are not responsible for outages or issues caused by third-party providers.

noWarranty.title: 12. No Warranty
noWarranty.content: THE SERVICE IS PROVIDED "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, OR NON-INFRINGEMENT.

limitationOfLiability.title: 13. Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.content1: TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, INTERGUIDE SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES.
limitationOfLiability.content2: INTERGUIDE'S TOTAL LIABILITY SHALL NOT EXCEED THE AMOUNT PAID BY YOU TO INTERGUIDE IN THE TWELVE (12) MONTHS PRECEDING THE CLAIM.

indemnification.title: 14. Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless InterGuide from claims arising out of your use of the service or violation of these Terms.

arbitration.title: 15. Arbitration and Class Action Waiver
arbitration.intro: Any dispute arising out of or relating to these Terms or the service shall be resolved by binding arbitration, rather than in court, except where prohibited by law.
arbitration.waiver: You waive the right to participate in class actions, class arbitrations, or representative actions.
arbitration.individual: Arbitration shall be conducted on an individual basis.

governingLaw.title: 16. Governing Law
governingLaw.intro: These Terms are governed by the laws of:
items: The State of California, USA, and
The State of Israel,

changesToTerms.title: 17. Changes to Terms
changesToTerms.content: We may update these Terms from time to time. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance.

builder.deleteVersionConfirm: Delete version {{version}}? This cannot be undone.

builder.imagesFoundInSnapshots: Images were found in version snapshots. You can recover them by merging blocks from a previous version into your current walkthrough.
builder.noRecoverableImages: No recoverable images found in version snapshots.
builder.emptyImageUrls: The version snapshots were saved with empty image URLs. This means the images cannot be automatically recovered.
builder.reuploadManually: You will need to re-upload the images manually by clicking on each empty image block and uploading the file again.

tips.recordGifsDesc: Use ScreenToGIF (free Windows app) to record screen captures as animated GIFs. Perfect for step-by-step demonstrations.
tips.annotatedImageDesc: Add an Annotated Image block to place clickable markers and explain details directly on the image.
tips.tickWhenFinished: Set Step to Tick When Finished
tips.tickWhenFinishedDesc: Change navigation type to 'Check-off Required' to make users confirm completion before advancing. Great for important steps.
tips.commonProblemsDesc: Click on a step, then select 'Common Problems' to add troubleshooting tips. Helps users solve issues independently.
tips.optimizeImagesDesc: Compress images to reduce file size and improve loading speed. Use tools like TinyPNG or Squoosh for best results.
tips.clearTitlesDesc: Write concise, action-oriented titles. Users should understand what they'll do in each step at a glance.
tips.externalLinksDesc: Add links in text blocks to reference documentation, videos, or other helpful resources for deeper learning.
tips.testMobileDesc: Preview your walkthrough on mobile to ensure it looks good and works smoothly on smaller screens.
tips.useVideoDesc: For multi-step processes, consider using video instead of static images. Videos can show the full sequence clearly.

messages.uploadImageToStart: Upload an image to start adding annotations
messages.interactiveMarkersAppear: Interactive markers will appear on the image

policy.title: Policies
policy.description: Official policies and procedures with legal authority and compliance standards.
policy.officialDescription: These policies establish official guidelines and requirements. All personnel are required to comply with these policies as applicable to their roles and responsibilities. This documentation carries full legal authority.
policy.noPoliciesDescription: Policy content has not been published yet. Check back later for official documentation.

procedure.title: Procedures

procedure.standardDescription: These procedures establish standardized workflows and best practices. Follow each step systematically to ensure consistent, high-quality results across all operations.
procedure.noProceduresDescription: Standard procedures have not been published yet. Check back later for operational guidelines.

onboardingTour.waiting: Waiting for element to be ready...

welcome.title: Welcome to InterGuide!
welcome.body: Let's get you started with a quick tour to create your first workspace, category, and walkthrough.

createWorkspace.title: Create Your First Workspace
createWorkspace.body: Click the "+ New Workspace" button to create a workspace for organizing your guides.

workspaceForm.title: Set Up Your Workspace
workspaceForm.body: Enter a workspace name and brand color. Logo and background are optional and can be added later.

enterWorkspace.title: Enter Your Workspace
enterWorkspace.body: Great! Now click on your newly created workspace to enter it.

goCategories.title: Navigate to Categories
goCategories.body: Before creating guides, let's create a category to organize them. Click the "Categories" tab.

createCategory.title: Create Your First Category
createCategory.body: Categories help organize your walkthroughs. Click "+ New Category" to create one.

goGuides.title: Navigate to Guides
goGuides.body: Perfect! Now let's create your first walkthrough. Click the "Guides" tab to go back.

createWalkthrough.title: Create Your First Walkthrough
createWalkthrough.body: Click "+ New Walkthrough" to create an interactive guide.

completeWalkthrough.title: Congratulations! 🎉
completeWalkthrough.body: You've successfully created your first walkthrough! You can now add more steps, customize content, and share your guide with others. The onboarding tour is complete.

addFirstStep.title: Add Content to Your Walkthrough
addFirstStep.body: Click the "+" button to add a step, give it a title, then click "+" again to add content blocks.

billing.proRequiresPayPal: Pro plan requires PayPal subscription. After creating your account, go to Dashboard and click "Upgrade to Pro" to subscribe via PayPal. The 14-day trial starts after PayPal approves your payment.
billing.planSelectionNote: You can start with the Free plan and upgrade anytime. Pro plan includes a 14-day free trial that starts after PayPal approves your subscription payment. Subscribe via PayPal to begin your trial.
billing.subscriptionDetails: Your subscription details and billing information
billing.afterTrialBilling: After the trial, billing will occur at $5/month as determined by PayPal.

billing.subscriptionActiveDesc: Your Pro subscription is active. Renewal is managed by PayPal according to your subscription terms.

billing.cardOnlyDisclaimer: Payments made without a PayPal account are still managed by PayPal and renew automatically unless cancelled.

billing.cancelledConfirmedDesc: PayPal has confirmed the cancellation. No further charges will occur. Final billing status is determined by PayPal.
billing.cancellationProcessingDesc: PayPal is processing the cancellation. Your access remains active until the end of the period. Final billing status is determined by PayPal.
billing.renewsAutomatically: Renews automatically unless cancelled in PayPal
